title: Release feed and filtering overhaul
description: Rebuilt release discovery with stronger filters and clearer metadata for agent consumers.
highlights: Added multi-field search over version, title, description, highlights, and tags
Improved release card readability with highlight-first summaries
Aligned API responses with persistent JSON release schema

title: Platform 3.0 launch with registry redesign
description: Introduced a redesigned registry and unified publishing workflow for agent-first packages.
highlights: Shipped a new registry architecture with improved indexing speed
Added breaking manifest validation for package metadata
Migrated release automation to a single publish pipeline

title: Security hardening for token exchange
description: Strengthened auth boundaries and improved visibility into suspicious token activity.
highlights: Added stricter nonce validation for auth callbacks
Introduced token replay detection alerts
Expanded audit events for privilege-sensitive actions

title: Stability patch for feed generation
description: Resolved regressions affecting digest and feed generation under high load.
highlights: Fixed duplicate entries in generated feed payloads
Improved retry behavior when upstream sources timeout
Reduced memory usage during digest build jobs

title: Advanced release workflow tooling
description: Expanded release workflow controls with better observability and safer rollouts.
highlights: Added staged rollout toggles for release channels
Introduced release health checks in the deployment dashboard
Enabled inline changelog previews before publish

title: Hotfix for search relevance
description: Patched ranking issues that buried high-quality docs in global search.
highlights: Adjusted ranking weights for verified documentation
Fixed tokenizer bug impacting hyphenated queries
Restored pagination cursor consistency

title: Marketplace UX and metadata upgrade
description: Improved package discoverability with richer metadata and better category pages.
highlights: Added package quality badges and compatibility labels
Introduced category-specific sorting presets
Improved card layout for dense browsing

title: Workflow templates v2
description: Released second-generation workflow templates for common agent orchestration patterns.
highlights: Added reusable template variables with schema hints
Introduced template cloning across workspaces
Published benchmarked starter templates

title: Core runtime overhaul
description: Major runtime release delivering a unified execution model and improved safety defaults.
highlights: Introduced a unified runtime contract across hosted and local agents
Enabled stricter default isolation boundaries
Reworked observability events for consistent tracing
